content: description calling all cat lovers this one s for you this blanket is constructed using the corner 2 corner crochet method this simple cat silhouettes are pleasing to the eye and perfect for beginners this pattern is free on my blog and available as an ad-free written version on ravelry you can find the lion brand kit here 1 with all the yarn needed and the printed fully written pdf the free corner 2 corner graph is available on my blog here 2 1 http //shrsl com/1wdkh 2 http //www eandpcrochet com/ p=759&preview=true
